Name: Grilled Cheese
Instructions: Take 2 slices of bread, put a slice of cheese between them and put in the toaster.

Name: French Toast
Instructions: Whisk eggs and milk together. Dip bread in the mixture and cook until golden brown.

Name: Creamy Pasta
Instructions: Cook pasta. Heat cream and mix with cooked pasta. Season with salt and pepper.

Name: Eggs on Toast
Instructions: Toast bread and cook eggs. Place cooked eggs on top of toast.

Name: Mac and Cheese
Instructions: Cook pasta. Melt cheese with milk and mix with cooked pasta. Season to taste.

Name: Shakshuka
Instructions: To make shakshuka, sauté tomatoes in olive oil, then crack eggs into the tomato sauce and cook until desired doneness.

Name: Cheese Omelette
Instructions: Whisk eggs, add cheese, and cook in a pan until the omelette is ready and the cheese is melted.
